Package com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization

Class MaximumRenderer

java.lang.Object
com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization.RaycastingRenderer
com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization.MaximumRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderer
public class MaximumRenderer extends RaycastingRenderer
A renderer that uses ray casting to compute the maximum intensity projection of the volume.
Author:
sanderjurgens

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MaximumRenderer(String name, RenderingTab renderingTab)
    Constructs a renderer to visualize the volume based on ray casting to compute the maximum intensity projection.

    slice(int startHeight, int endHeight)
    Produce a slice of the 2D image using a specific ray casting algorithm, from a given starting height up to and including a given ending height based on the number of compute threads.
